_header: Why ne serve we Christ and seek his saught
_description: Exhortation to serve Christ — seventy-eight lines in nine stanzas of varying length, carrying the same rhymes throughout

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Hwi ne serue we crist and secheþ his sauhtseoþþe vs
                    wel at þe font fulluht by tauht…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…Þureh þe riche blode þe roche to chonLouerd
                    haue mercy of vs euervychon
OxfJesus29.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             An Old English Miscellany: A Bestiary, Kentish Sermons, Proverbs of
                Alfred and Religious Poems of the Thirteenth Century.
EETS
         o.s. 49 (1872); repr. 1988: 90-2.
